data.text: @EveExamines @AMS_UBC @BCGovNews It's the students leading the way. So far, this only applies to the student union building.

@AMS_UBC @beansprouts_mom @BCGovNews Good for you, UBC. It’s the right thing to do and it’s the smart thing to do. When people get Covid at work they’re gonna have workers comp claims. They are going to be a lot of them. You’re helping save yourself from that.

@AMS_UBC @BCGovNews You’re creating more safety for students than Dr. Bonnie Henry, @VCHDrDaly @adriandix @jjhorgan @bcndp @VCHhealthcare (who were recently called out by Twitter as misinformation source)
